member.name: M:Zeroit.Framework.MaterialDesign.ColorScheme.#ctor(Zeroit.Framework.MaterialDesign.Primary,Zeroit.Framework.MaterialDesign.Primary,Zeroit.Framework.MaterialDesign.Primary,Zeroit.Framework.MaterialDesign.Accent,Zeroit.Framework.MaterialDesign.TextShade)
member.summary: Defines the Color Scheme to be used for all forms.
member.param: The primary color, a -500 color is suggested here.
A darker version of the primary color, a -700 color is suggested here.
A lighter version of the primary color, a -100 color is suggested here.
The accent color, a -200 color is suggested here.
The text color, the one with the highest contrast is suggested.
